## üåü Why TagManager?

Ever lost a file in the digital maze of your computer? Tired of endless folder hierarchies that never quite fit your workflow? **TagManager** revolutionizes file organization with a powerful, flexible tagging system that adapts to how you actually work.

```bash
# Transform this chaos...
Documents/Projects/Work/Client_A/2024/Reports/Q1/final_v2_FINAL.pdf

# Into this simplicity...
tm add final_report.pdf --tags work client-a q1 2024 final
tm search --tags work q1  # Instantly find what you need!
```

## ‚ú® Features

### üéØ **Core Operations**

- **üè∑Ô∏è Smart Tagging**: Add multiple tags to any file with intelligent suggestions
- **üîç Powerful Search**: Find files by tags, paths, or combinations with fuzzy matching
- **üìä Rich Analytics**: Comprehensive statistics and insights about your tag usage
- **üóÇÔ∏è Bulk Operations**: Mass tag operations with pattern matching and dry-run previews

### üé® **Beautiful Visualizations**

- **üå≥ Tree View**: Gorgeous directory trees showing your tagged files
- **‚òÅÔ∏è Tag Clouds**: Visual tag frequency representations
- **üìà ASCII Charts**: Professional statistical charts right in your terminal

### üîß **Smart Filtering**

- **üîÑ Duplicate Detection**: Find files with identical tag sets
- **üèöÔ∏è Orphan Finder**: Locate untagged files that need attention
- **üîó Similarity Analysis**: Discover related files through intelligent tag matching
- **üéØ Cluster Analysis**: Identify tag usage patterns and file groupings

### üöÄ **Advanced Features**

- **‚ö° Lightning Fast**: Optimized for large file collections
- **üé≠ Flexible Patterns**: Support for glob patterns and regex matching
- **üõ°Ô∏è Safe Operations**: Dry-run mode for all destructive operations
- **üé® Rich Output**: Beautiful, colorful terminal interface with emojis
- **üîß Configurable**: Customizable display options and behavior

## üöÄ Installation

### üì¶ **Install from PyPI (Recommended)**

```bash
pip install tagmanager-cli
```

That's it! TagManager is now available as `tm` or `tagmanager` command.

> **üìù Note**: The package name is `tagmanager-cli` but the commands are `tm` and `tagmanager`.

### üîß **Install from Source**

```bash
git clone https://github.com/davidtbilisi/TagManager.git
cd TagManager
pip install .
```

### üìã **Requirements**

- **Python 3.7+** (Python 3.8+ recommended)
- **UTF-8 compatible terminal** (most modern terminals)
- **Dependencies**: `typer` and `rich` (automatically installed)

## ‚ö° Quick Start

```bash
# Add tags to files
tm add document.pdf --tags work important project-x

# Search for files
tm search --tags work project-x

# View all files in a beautiful tree
tm ls --tree

# See your tag usage patterns
tm tags --cloud

# Get comprehensive statistics
tm stats --chart

# Find similar files
tm filter similar document.pdf

# Bulk operations with dry-run
tm bulk add "*.py" --tags python code --dry-run
```

## üìñ Documentation

### Basic Commands

| Command     | Description              | Example                              |
| ----------- | ------------------------ | ------------------------------------ |
| `tm add`    | Add tags to a file       | `tm add file.txt --tags work urgent` |
| `tm remove` | Remove files or clean up | `tm remove --path file.txt`          |
| `tm search` | Find files by tags/path  | `tm search --tags python --exact`    |
| `tm ls`     | List all tagged files    | `tm ls --tree`                       |
| `tm tags`   | Show all tags            | `tm tags --cloud`                    |
| `tm stats`  | Show statistics          | `tm stats --chart`                   |

### Advanced Operations

#### üîç **Smart Search**

```bash
# Boolean search with multiple tags
tm search --tags python web --match-all    # Files with BOTH tags
tm search --tags python web               # Files with EITHER tag

# Combined tag and path search
tm search --tags python --path /projects/

# Exact vs fuzzy matching
tm search --tags "web-dev" --exact        # Exact match only
tm search --tags web                      # Fuzzy matching (finds "web-dev", "webapp", etc.)
```

#### üéØ **Bulk Operations**

```bash
# Mass tagging with patterns
tm bulk add "*.py" --tags python code
tm bulk add "**/*.md" --tags documentation

# Safe operations with dry-run
tm bulk retag --from old-tag --to new-tag --dry-run

# Bulk cleanup
tm bulk remove --tag deprecated
```

#### üîß **Smart Filtering**

```bash
# Find duplicate tag sets
tm filter duplicates

# Locate untagged files
tm filter orphans

# Find similar files (30% similarity threshold)
tm filter similar important-doc.pdf

# Discover tag clusters
tm filter clusters --min-size 3

# Find isolated files
tm filter isolated --max-shared 1
```

## üèóÔ∏è Architecture

TagManager follows a clean, modular architecture:

```
TagManager/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ tm.py                 # Main CLI interface
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ app/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ add/             # File tagging operations
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ bulk/            # Bulk operations
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ filter/          # Smart filtering & analysis
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ search/          # Search functionality
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ stats/           # Statistics & analytics
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ visualization/   # Tree views, charts, clouds
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ helpers.py       # Core utilities
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ tests/               # Comprehensive test suite
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ config.ini          # Configuration settings
```

### üë®‚Äçüíª **Developers**

### üìö **Researchers**



### üè¢ **Project Managers**

```bash

```
